title: Printing History
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Publications](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Publications) : Printing History**

**Publisher:** [American Printing History Association](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/APHA) (USA)  
**Frequency:** Bi-annually

A scholarly journal available only through membership in [APHA](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/APHA). Recent Issues have dealt with a variety of topics related to the history of printing, publishing, books, type, typography, paper and related industries.

**Website:** [www.printinghistory.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010202839/http:/www.printinghistory.org/htm/journal/articles.html)
author: Conor
